title: Staff of Arcane Blessing
content:
Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 100

Staff of Arcane Blessing

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning

AMystra's Blessing: Bless grants an additional 1d4 to Saving Throws and Weapon Attack Rolls, and an additional 2d4 to Spell Attack Rolls.

Main Hand OnlyTopple

Though dust has settled into every nook and cranny of this staff, it still emanates a soothing aura. Its previous owner cast it aside - forgotten because there was nobody to bless.

Quarterstaff Versatile

Staff of Arcan
